parameters: \n<\N[1]>Probably best ta not wake her up right now.
\n<\N[1]>I need your help to get one from the \C[7]north western\C[0] \C[25]Volcano\C[0].
\n<\N[3]>This is serious, let's chat with \C[13]Dereck\C[0] about this.
\n<\N[3]>*whispers* Ahh, I think \C[13]Zera\C[0] just looked over. *whispers*
\n<\N[1]>I need your help to get the other \C[17]idol\C[0] from the \C[7]north western\C[0] \C[25]Volcano\C[0].
\n<\N[2]>Hey up \C[13]Cherry\C[0], this is a good work-out ain't it.
\n<\N[2]>Goodie, goodie, galore I plow some more.
\n<\N[4]>Yeah, that's just grandma being a grandma.
\n<\N[7]>Is \C[13]Blueberry\C[0] alright, he's always bit nervous around me?
\n<\N[1]>Ahhh, he’s just a litte shy you know, always has been.
\n<\N[7]>I’ll help them out in a couple minutes.
\n<\N[7]>Seeing all those \C[25]Civitatem\C[0] soldiers brings me back.
\n<\N[7]>Sometimes I miss my dad’s old shop.
\n<\N[7]>But I’m much happier here, thank you very much.
\n<\N[7]>I pulled one over on them soldiers.
\n<\N[7]>Told em' I needed to "finish the harvest".
\n<\N[7]>Otherwise the grain would get sad, and welt.
\n<\N[7]>Still do though sadly, but I'm just so tired.
\n<\N[7]>*whisper* I swear those \C[13]Berry Twins\C[0] can't harvest to save their lives. *whisper*
Cherry puts her hand on the idol.
\n<\N[1]>Owww\|, feels like I smashed into a rock.
\n<\N[1]>\C[13]Cloudo\C[0] you've right done it this time!
\n<\N[6]>Right then, which one of you did this?
\n<\N[6]>I'll find a replacement on the way to \C[25]Civitatem\C[0].
\n<\N[1]>Soldiers have closed it for the anniversary of \C[13]Great King Leon's\C[0] victory.
\n<\N[6]>This is bad, this is very bad.
\n<\N[6]>My Dad told me about the other \C[17]idols\C[0] of \C[25]Brassica\C[0], many years ago.
\n<\N[6]>The one here was discovered over hundred years ago by my great grandfather.
\n<\N[6]>It was rumoured that there were other ones in dead volcanos.
\n<\N[6]>\C[13]Cherry\C[0] you take \C[13]Cloudo\C[0], \C[13]Strawberry\C[0] and \C[13]Blueberry\C[0] to the \C[7]north west\C[0] \C[25]Volcano\C[0] and find another \C[17]idol\C[0].
\n<\N[6]>Hopefully it emits the same aura, that scares \C[10]Monsters\C[0].
\n<\N[6]>\C[13]Strawberry\C[0] and \C[13]Blueberry\C[0] both know magic, you should be fine.
\n<\N[6]>And if you fail we can also talk with \C[13]Agnes\C[0] about...
\n<\N[4]>She's sleeping now, so please don't tell her about this before we comeback.
\n<\N[6]>Here \C[13]Cherry\C[0] take this, it's dangerous out there.
You recieved some useful items. And a knife...?
\n<\N[6]>And always remember to check your items before you leave.
\n<\N[13]>The \C[13]King\C[0] has ordered that you be sent to the \C[25]Outpost\C[0] immediately!
var cList = [cSE, cJump, cSE, cJump, cSE, cJump, cEnd];
var route1 = {list: cList, repeat: false, skippable: false, wait: true};
\n<\N[13]>The \C[13]King\C[0] wishes to enquire about the recent events involving the destruction of the \C[17]golden idol\C[0].
\n<\N[13]>On this day, the anniversary of \C[13]Great King Leon's \C[0] victory.
\n<\N[13] scratched face>The \C[13]King\C[0] just wishes to clear up this \C[17]idol\C[0] mess.
var cList = [cSE, cJump, cSE, cJump, cSE, cJump, cSE, cJump,cSE, cJump, cSE, cJump, cSE, cJump, cSE, cJump, cEnd];
var route1 = {list: cList, repeat: false, skippable: false, wait: true};
\n<\N[2]>Eeeeee, so we get to work for the \C[13]King\C[0]?
var route1 = {list: cList, repeat: false, skippable: false, wait: true};
\n<\N[4]>Hold on a minute, I need to see my mum.

parameters.name: One Man Symphony - Royalty Free Soundtrack Collection - 06 Wake Up

parameters: \n<\N[13]>But you will not be allowed to return until you have seen the \C[13]King\C[0]!
var route1 = {list: cList, repeat: false, skippable: false, wait: true};

var route = {list: cList, repeat: false, skippable: false, wait: true};

\n<\N[7]>Don't worry \C[13]Cloudo\C[0], your mummy is doing fine.
\n<\N[7]>Your grandad is taking good care of her.
\n<\N[4]>Come on now, we have to check on every \C[17]house\C[0].

parameters.name: One Man Symphony - Royalty Free Soundtrack Collection - 69 One Last Try

parameters: \n<\N[2]>We're here for you now, Misses Rere.
\n<\N[11]>She came running out with a sword, demanding that we leave \C[25]Brassica\C[0] forever.
\n<\N[11]>I can only guess how frustrated she must have felt.
\n<\N[11]>Then those grey \C[10]Monsters\C[0] came back with a vengence.
\n<\N[2]>EVERYTHING WE DO FOR HIM JUST MAKES THINGS WORSE AND WORSE.
\n<\N[11]>Well, you shouldn't worry about the \C[13]King's\C[0] presence any longer.
\n<\N[11]>We are to join him soon. A coroner and some his men shall come by to recieve some of my men.
\n<\N[11]>The influx of \C[10]Monsters\C[0] from the \C[25]Dark Castle\C[0] in the \C[7]north\C[0] is not worth the risk.
\n<\N[4]>Then what the bloody hell are we suppose to do!?
\n<\N[11]>As compensation, you have access to the entire \C[25]Outpost\C[0].
\n<\N[1]>Were going to the \C[25]Dark Castle\C[0], and finishing this on our terms.
\n<\N[1]>We're the only ones that can protect \C[25]Brassica\C[0] now, we kill the evil at the source.
\n<\N[6]>I'll clear this up, while you lot get the other \C[17]idol\C[0].
\n<\N[6]>*whisper* I could possibly glue this back together. *whisper*
\n<\N[6]>We need a new one before nightfall.
\n<\N[6]>Too right, saving \C[25]Brassica\C[0] is our top priority.
\n<\N[6]>\C[13]Cloudo\C[0], don’t forget to equip a weapon in each hand.
\n<\N[6]>I'll just...\| wait for her to cool down.
\n<\N[6]>She just needs to vent every now and then.
The engravings have weathered with time, and are unreadable.
